TopicTitle: Using a stock part from 1.0.5 in 1.0.4

Articles.Content: Hi, I could not find this previously answered and though this would be the proper place to ask.  Specifically I want to take the vector from 1.0.5 and use it in 1.0.4.  I tried simply copying the part to the corresponding directory in the GameData folder, but the game crashes during loading.  Thanks for any help!

51 minutes ago, Cornholio said:

Hi, I could not find this previously answered and though this would be the proper place to ask.  Specifically I want to take the vector from 1.0.5 and use it in 1.0.4.  I tried simply copying the part to the corresponding directory in the GameData folder, but the game crashes during loading.  Thanks for any help!

As far as I know, the Vector doesn't use any new 1.0.5-specific code, so copying seems like it ought to work... but that's just a guess.  It's also possible that you haven't copied everything you needed to.

Could you elaborate on exactly which files you copied across?

(And also... just out of curiosity, why are you playing in 1.0.4 if you have 1.0.5 available?)

I play in a heavily modded game under career and will update the game and add-ons if/when 1.1 hits. 

I copied over the folder SSSM from the squad/parts/engine folder of my updated steam v1.0.5 to the squad/parts/engine folder copy of 1.0.4 that I've been working in for a while. I assume that there's probably more that I need to copy. Thanks for the help.

1 hour ago, Cornholio said:

I play in a heavily modded game under career and will update the game and add-ons if/when 1.1 hits. 

I copied over the folder SSSM from the squad/parts/engine folder of my updated steam v1.0.5 to the squad/parts/engine folder copy of 1.0.4 that I've been working in for a while. I assume that there's probably more that I need to copy. Thanks for the help. 

One thing that's worth trying-- check the game's log file after the crash.  It's possible there might be something there that would indicate what the problem is.

Not guaranteed, but possible.  Certainly worth taking a look.

Didn't the part test config format change in 1.0.5? That means that for starters, the Vector will have stuff in its config file that 1.0.4 cannot read. This can either mean that that section will be ignored, or that it will hard crash the game because the module call errors out.

Besides the part folder, do I have to copy anything else over from 1.0.5 to 1.0.4?  

I'll open up the configs and compare and see if that works tonight.
